mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_paf_sku_stock WHERE comm_id = #{comm_id} AND sku_id = #{sku_id}

select p.COMM_NM commName,su.spec spec,sk.recom_price rePrice,p.SALES_VOLUME saVolume from dpta.t_paf_comm p left join dpta.t_category c on p.category_id = c.category_id left join dpta.t_paf_sku_stock sk on p.COMM_ID=sk.comm_id left join dpta.t_sku su on sk.sku_id = su.id order by p.sales_volume desc limit 10
select d.DISTR_NM distrNm,sum(sm.COM_P) comP from dpta.t_distr d left join dpta.t_settle_m sm on d.DISTR_ID = sm.DISTR_ID group by d.DISTR_NM order by sum(sm.COM_P) desc limit 10

select a.COMM_NM from (select p.comm_nm,max(p.SALES_VOLUME) FROM dpta.t_paf_comm p left join dpta.t_shp_comm sc on p.comm_id = sc.COMM_ID left join dpta.t_shop s on sc.SHOP_ID = s.SHOP_ID left join dpta.t_distr d on s.DISTR_ID = d.DISTR_ID where d.DISTR_NM = #{d}) a

select d.DISTR_NM distrName,sum(s.com_p) distrM from dpta.t_distr d left join dpta.t_settle_m s on d.DISTR_ID = s.DISTR_ID where s.SETTLE_TM like concat(#{d},'%') group by d.DISTR_NM order by sum(s.com_p) desc limit 2
select sum(s.com_p) from dpta.t_distr d left join dpta.t_settle_m s on d.DISTR_ID = s.DISTR_ID where d.DISTR_NM = #{d} and s.SETTLE_TM like concat(#{b},'%')

select d.DISTR_NM distrName,sum(s.com_p) distrM from dpta.t_distr d left join dpta.t_settle_m s on d.DISTR_ID = s.DISTR_ID where s.SETTLE_TM like concat(#{d},'%') group by d.DISTR_NM order by sum(s.com_p) asc limit 2
